price: 于是，术士们拜倒下去，他们说：“我们已归信哈伦和穆萨的养主了。”
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
